title: Test pep8-dlk failed
body:
At first, if I run `make pep8-dlk` before `make build`, it fials.
```
$ make pep8-dlk
# Check dlk PEP8
docker run --rm -t blueoil_$(id -un):60d18e0 /bin/bash -c "cd dlk && pycodestyle --ignore=W --max-line-length=120 --exclude='*static/pb*','*docs/*','*.eggs*','*tvm/*','*tests/*','backends/*' ."
Unable to find image 'blueoil_masuda:60d18e0' locally
docker: Error response from daemon: pull access denied for blueoil_masuda, repository does not exist or may require 'docker login'.
See 'docker run --help'.
Makefile:34: recipe for target 'pep8-dlk' failed
make: *** [pep8-dlk] Error 125
```
We need to add `build` dependency into `pep8-dlk` as same as other tests.
And after fixed that, I got the error on the current master branch.
```
$ make pep8-dlk
...
# Check dlk PEP8
docker run --rm -t blueoil_$(id -un):60d18e0-dirty /bin/bash -c "cd dlk && pycodestyle --ignore=W --max-line-length=120 --exclude='*static/pb*','*docs/*','*.eggs*','*tvm/*','*tests/*','backends/*' ."
./python/dlk/core/data_types.py:19:1: E302 expected 2 blank lines, found 1
./python/dlk/core/data_types.py:22:1: E302 expected 2 blank lines, found 1
./python/dlk/core/operators.py:1745:5: E301 expected 1 blank line, found 0
./python/dlk/core/operators.py:1749:1: E302 expected 2 blank lines, found 1
Makefile:34: recipe for target 'pep8-dlk' failed
make: *** [pep8-dlk] Error 1
```
I checked jenkins settings and I found there is not `make pep8-dlk` command.
So, we should do the following tasks to fix them.

- [x] Add `build` dependency to `pep8-dlk` into `Makefile`
- [x] Fix codes to follow pep8
- [x] Add Jenkins settings to test pep8
